# RS_Standard_Material â€” Property Reference
# Use with set_material_property / set_material_properties

## Base
base_color : color                    # (color 127 127 127)
base_color_map : texturemap           # texture slot
base_color_weight : float             # 0.0-1.0
diffuse_model : integer               # 0=Lambert, 1=Oren-Nayar
diffuse_roughness : float             # Oren-Nayar roughness
metalness : float                     # 0.0-1.0

## Reflection
refl_color : color                    # reflection tint
refl_color_map : texturemap
refl_weight : float                   # 0.0-1.0
refl_roughness : float                # 0.0 = mirror, 1.0 = diffuse
refl_roughness_map : texturemap
refl_ior : float                      # index of refraction
refl_aniso : float                    # anisotropy amount
refl_aniso_rotation : float           # anisotropy rotation
refl_samples : integer
refl_isGlossiness : boolean           # true = glossiness mode (inverted roughness)

## Refraction
refr_color : color
refr_weight : float                   # 0.0 = opaque, 1.0 = fully transparent
refr_roughness : float
refr_samples : integer
refr_thin_walled : boolean
refr_abbe : float                     # chromatic dispersion

## Subsurface Scattering
ss_depth : float                      # scatter depth (0 = off)
ss_scatter_color : color
ss_phase : float                      # -1.0 to 1.0

## Multi-Scatter (SSS mode 2)
ms_color : color
ms_amount : float
ms_radius : color                     # per-channel scatter radius
ms_radius_scale : float
ms_phase : float
ms_mode : integer                     # 0=Christensen-Burley, 2=Random Walk
ms_samples : integer

## Sheen
sheen_color : color
sheen_weight : float                  # 0.0-1.0
sheen_roughness : float

## Thin Film
thinfilm_ior : float
thinfilm_thickness : float            # 0 = off, ~300-700 for rainbow

## Coat
coat_color : color
coat_weight : float                   # 0.0-1.0
coat_roughness : float
coat_IOR : float
coat_aniso : float
coat_aniso_rotation : float
coat_bump_input : texturemap          # separate bump for coat

## Emission
emission_color : color
emission_color_map : texturemap
emission_weight : float               # 0.0 = off

## Opacity
opacity_color : color                 # white = opaque, black = transparent
opacity_color_map : texturemap

## Bump / Displacement
bump_input : texturemap
displacement_input : texturemap

## Overall
overall_color : color                 # multiplied on top of everything
